subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Penn State beat Temple despite Coach Joe Paterno, the 81-year-old Hall of Famer, complaining of soreness in his leg since kicking a ball in practice several weeks ago.
snippet: Penn State beat Temple despite Coach Joe Paterno, the 81-year-old Hall of Famer, complaining of soreness in his leg since kicking a ball in practice several weeks ago.
